allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: add receipt scanning, store preferences, settings, language support, and post-save price comparison

- Receipt scanning: multi-photo receipt OCR via GPT-4o Vision edge function with cross-photo deduplication, editable review UI, batch save to database
- Price comparison: after saving receipt products, compare prices across user''s preferred stores and show savings/could-save summary modal
- Store preferences: user selects 3 preferred stores on first login, used for filtering and receipt store selection
- Settings tab: new settings screen with account info, store preferences, and sign out
- Language support: English/French translation system with LanguageContext
- Auth hardening: proactive stale session clearing, graceful token refresh failure handling
- UI redesign: center raised + button in tab bar, hero receipt scanner on mode selection page
- New edge functions: process-receipt, categorize-products, process-image, structure-text
- New services: StoreMatchingService, StoreService, LanguageService, EdgeFunctionService

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
